name: Autorizações
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND application:top-saude AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:topsaude_v12/ws/integracaoagendamentoonline OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/wsintegracaoinpartopme OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/wsptuchat) AND NOT (resource_name:post_/comunicacaochatv1.svc)}.as_count()

sum:trace.http.request.hits{env:prd AND application:top-saude AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:topdown.ptu.sispac.api-http-client OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/integracaoagendamentoonline-http-client OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/wsintegracaoinpartopme-http-client OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/wsptuchat-http-client)}.as_count()

name: Contas Médicas
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND application:top-saude AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:apicontasmedicas OR service:contasmedicas OR service:topsaudev12/apis/topdownanscalculocopart OR service:topsaude_v12/portaltiss OR service:topsaude_v12/rsus OR service:topsaudev12/ws/wsimagemreembolso OR service:topsaudev12/ws/wsintegracaopreviareembolso OR service:topsaudev12/ws/wsintegracaoreembolso OR service:topsaudev12/ws/wsvalorreembolso)}.as_count()

name: Integrações-Internas
queries: sum:trace.aspnet_core.request.hits{env:prd AND application:top-saude AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:gerenciadormovimentacoesbeneficiarioapi OR service:topdown.autorizacao.medica.repository.service.api OR service:topdown.core.service.endereco.service.api OR service:topdown.movimentacao.cadastral.repository.service.api)}.as_count()

sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND application:top-saude AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:topsaude_v12/tsnmvc OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/topdown.protocolo.ws.siebel OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/tiss/v* OR service:apialcadapagamento OR service:pwaalcadapagamento OR service:topsaude_v12/enviosms)}.as_count()

sum:trace.http.request.hits{env:prd AND application:top-saude AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:gerenciadormovimentacoesbeneficiarioapi-http-client OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/topdown.protocolo.ws.siebel-http-client OR service:topsaude_v12/tsnmvc-http-client OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/tiss/v* OR service:topsaude_v12/enviosms-http-client)}.as_count()

name: Integrações-Portais
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND application:top-saude AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:topsaude_v12/portal_servicos OR service:topsaudev12/ws/beneficiarioinfofinanceiroservice OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/ws.seguros.portalseguros.services OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/ws.seguros.service OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/ws.segurosunimed.service OR service:topsaudev12/ws/wsappunificadoseguros OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/wsgeocode)}.as_count()

sum:trace.http.request.hits{env:prd AND application:top-saude AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:topdown.pagamento.service.api-http-client OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/ws.seguros.portalseguros.services-http-client OR service:topsaude_v12/ws/wsgeocode-http-client )}.as_count()

name: Portal do Corretor – Chamadas aos serviços WCF
API Corretora Digital – Chamadas aos serviços WCF
RCPSI - Seguro Responsabilidade Civil Individual - Legado
RCPSO - Seguro Responsabilidade Civil Coletivo - Legado
Cotação
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais AND (resource_name:post_/api/cotacao* OR resource_name:get_/api/produto/* OR resource_name:get_/api/endereco/* OR resource_name:post_/api/corretor/* OR resource_name:get_/cotacao/*)}.as_count()

sum:trace.http.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais-http-client AND (resource_name:post_brms-gateway-vida-b2c-cotacao-hml.lb.digital-segurosunimed.com/* OR resource_name:get_uniservices.digital-segurosunimed.com/uniservices-base21/api/* OR resource_name:get_api-analisesespeciais.segurosunimed.com.br/*)}.as_count()

name: Área Cliente
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais AND (resource_name:post_/api/cotacao* OR resource_name:get_/api/produto/* OR resource_name:get_/api/endereco/* OR resource_name:post_/api/corretor/* OR resource_name:get_/cotacao/*)}.as_count()

name: Autenticação
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais AND (resource_name:post_/api/authentication/* OR resource_name:get_/api/sso/* OR resource_name:get_/singlesignon/* OR resource_name:get_/logout* OR resource_name:get_/login* OR resource_name:get_/api/authentication/*)}.as_count()

sum:trace.http.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais-http-client AND (resource_name:get_homologacao-rh-sso-external.segurosunimed.com.br/auth/realms/unimed-externos/*)}.as_count()

name: Layouts
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais* AND (resource_name:get_/api/footer* OR resource_name:get_/content/* OR resource_name:get_/scripts/* OR resource_name:get_/api/usuario/*)}.as_count()
sum:trace.http.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais* AND (resource_name:get_cms.segurosunimed.com.br/wp-json/*)}.as_count()

name: Proposta
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais* AND (resource_name:get_/api/papelaria* OR resource_name:post_/api/cotacao/obtemproposta/* OR resource_name:post_/api/corretor/verificaassinaturacorretor*)}.as_count()

name: Transmissão
queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND service:calculemais* AND (resource_name:put_/integration/proposta/*)}.as_count()

name: Token URL do Sinistro Online Patrimonial
EMPRE
queries: sum:trace.servlet.request.hits{env:prd AND service:re-apolices-prd AND http.status_code:5* AND (resource_name:get_/consultar-franquia-empresarial/cep/_cep_/ocupacao/_ocupacao_/subocupacao/_subocupacao OR resource_name:get_/ocupacao OR resource_name:get_/sub-ocupacao OR resource_name:get_/corretor OR resource_name:get_/proposta/empresarial/consultar OR resource_name:post_/proposta/empresarial/salvar OR resource_name:post_/proposta/empresarial/salvarpdf OR resource_name:post_/apolice/empresarial/v2 OR resource_name:get_/cotacao/empresarial/consultar OR resource_name:post_/cotacao/empresarial/validar-aceitacao OR resource_name:post_/cotacao/empresarial/salvar OR resource_name:post_/cotacao/empresarial/salvarpdf OR resource_name:post_/cotacao/empresarial/_numerocotacao_/status OR resource_name:post_/proposta/empresarial/_numeroproposta_/status)}.as_count()

name: GERAL
queries: sum:trace.servlet.request.hits{env:prd AND service:re-apolices-prd AND http.status_code:5* AND (resource_name:get_/dados-por-corretor OR resource_name:get_/profissao OR resource_name:get_/escritorio-regional OR resource_name:get_/cnae OR resource_name:post_/renovacao/gerarpropostas OR resource_name:get_/swagger-ui.html OR resource_name:get_/ OR resource_name:get_/v2/api-docs OR resource_name:get_/swagger-resources/configuration/security OR resource_name:get_/swagger-resources/configuration/ui OR resource_name:get_/swagger-resources)}.as_count()

name: RCP
queries: sum:trace.servlet.request.hits{env:prd AND service:re-apolices-prd AND http.status_code:5* AND (resource_name:get_/especialidade OR resource_name:get_/renovacao/rcp/consultar OR resource_name:get_/proposta/rcp/consultar OR resource_name:post_/proposta/rcp/salvar OR resource_name:post_/proposta/rcp/salvarpdf OR resource_name:post_/apolice/rcp/v2 OR resource_name:post_/proposta/rcp/_numeroproposta_/status OR resource_name:post_/cotacao/rcp/salvar OR resource_name:get_/cotacao/rcp/consultar OR resource_name:post_/cotacao/rcp/salvarpdf OR resource_name:post_/cotacao/rcp/_numerocotacao_/status)}.as_count()

name: Portal Segurado

queries: sum:trace.aspnet.request.hits{env:prd AND http.status_code:5* AND (service:topsaude/ws/servicosunimedseguros OR service:topsaude/ws/wsgeocode OR service:topsaude/ws/wsbeneficiarioportal OR service:topsaude/ws/servicesmsinfobip OR service:topsaude/ws/servicosunimedsegurosodo)}.as_count()
